trigger_definitions.name: High-Confidence Safety Filter Breach
trigger_definitions.description: Triggered when Gemini safety classifiers detect extreme violations of safety standards.

trigger_definitions.name: Frontier Redline Breach
trigger_definitions.description: Triggered when model outputs approach prohibited capability thresholds for CBRN or Cyber misuse.

trigger_definitions.name: Privacy Violation (PII)
trigger_definitions.description: Triggered when potential Personally Identifiable Information is detected in model output.

ACT-GOOG-001.description: Immediately terminate the current response and provide a standard safety refusal message.

parameters.message: I cannot fulfill this request as it violates our safety policies.

ACT-GOOG-002.description: Notify the Responsibility and Safety Council (RSC) for manual review of the incident.

ACT-GOOG-003.description: Temporarily limit the user's API access rate to prevent rapid jailbreak attempts.

ACT-GOOG-004.description: Suspend model availability for a specific task or globally if a redline is breached.
